constructor.details: Sets the storage for the specified addresses

params._link: The address of the LINK token contract

getChainlinkToken().details: This is the public implementation for chainlinkTokenAddress, which is an internal method of the ChainlinkClient contract

params.durationInSeconds: the length in seconds the lottery will be open.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: MyContract is an example contract which requests data from the Chainlink network

methods.constructor: Deploy the contract with a specified address for the LINK and Oracle contract addresses

getChainlinkToken().notice: Returns the address of the LINK token

open_OLD(uint256).notice: Opens the lottery allowing players to join. Sends a request to the Chainlink alarm oracle that will automatically close the lottery after durationInSeconds passed.only the owner/deployer of the contract can call this function

withdrawLink().notice: Withdraw LINK from this contract NOTE: DO NOT USE THIS IN PRODUCTION AS IT CAN BE CALLED BY ANY ADDRESS. THIS IS PURELY FOR EXAMPLE PURPOSES ONLY.
